import React from 'react'; function ScoreBoard(props) { return (
Name Score Color
{this.props.fun[0].p1Name} {this.props.fun[0].p1Score} {this.props.fun[0].p1Color}
{this.props.fun[0].p2Name} {this.props.fun[0].p2Score} {this.props.fun[0].p2Color}

Active player: {this.state.activePlayer}
); } export default ScoreBoard;
